## ğŸš€ Installation

### Prerequisites

- Node.js 20+
- npm or yarn

### Update Instructions

```bash
# Pull the latest changes
git pull origin main

# Install/update dependencies
npm install

# Build the project
npm run build

# Start the development server
npm run dev
```
